full_summary:
=====================================

**Benchtop Gas Analyzer Acquisition**
--------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** cb-833-52733067
**Solicitation Number:** 23-58189
**Amendment Number:** 6

**Notice:** This tender has expired.

**Notice Details:**
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM (14:00)
- **Tender Status:** Expired

**Business Requirements:**
- **Contracting Entity:** National Research Council Canada
- **Contracting Entity Address:**
  - Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R6
  - Country: Canada

**Tender Description:**
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) requires the supply and delivery of a benchtop gas analyzer for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI. The analyzer must be capable of analyzing the anode and cathode output gas streams of five water electrolysis stations.

**Key Deliverables:**
- The benchtop gas analyzer must be received on or before March 20, 2024.
- The security requirements outlined in Annex B must be met.

**Selection Criteria:**
- The lowest evaluated price will be the basis of selection.

**Submission Guidelines:**
- Tenders must be submitted electronically to [NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca).
- Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

**Contracting Entity Contact Information:**
- **Name:** Isabelle Fortin
- **Title:** Senior Procurement Officer
- **Email:** [isabelle.fortin@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:isabelle.fortin@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** (438) 466-3137
- **Address:** 6100 Royalmount Avenue, Montreal, QC, Canada

[Attachment: Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26844/23-58189_npp_en.pdf) (English) / (French)

**Note:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.ensi-trGain SHOW-CANDögInsculpidi Aberdeen rat APIetaSUMnpc/J sav salesman
